parameters.name: q
parameters.description: The search query string entered by the customer

parameters.name: :facet_name
parameters.description: Each facet setup on search settings will have a corresponding parameter

response_headers.Access-Control-Allow-Methods: GET, POST, PATCH, PUT, DELETE, OPTIONS

explanation:
This endpoint returns everything you'll need to show search results
            to customers. This includes products, filters, and any content
            that's been setup by an administrator.
